name: Candy Mayhem
description:
Candy Mayhem is a very addictive match 3 game.

Features:

- 100+ well designed candylicious levels

- Free to play

- Sweet powerful combo boosters and delicious power ups

- Stunning graphics and unique gameplay

- Easy to play, challenging to master

- More levels added every 2 weeks

Game Modes

Get the targets - destroy candy to reach the required score and get the stars

Get Ingredients - destroy the candy and collect the ingredients

Timer - get the targets before time runs out

Sugar Crush - destroy all the sugar

Just Candy - collect the required number of candy the same colour

Boosters

Sugar Blast - Gives +5 extra moves

Candy Boost - Gives +30 seconds

Candy Bomb - Destroy 1 item in game

Sweet Crush - Crush 1 item in game

Candy Swipe - Crushes all candy in a line

No candy was harmed in the making of this game!
